Metadata: Solver version, HPC job ID, user, date/time, geometry name, freq range

EM_Interchange: IEEE standards for antenna patterns (145, 149, etc.)

S_Parameters: Magnitude/phase over freq for S11, S21, Snn, etc.
Antenna_Patterns: Far-field polar plots, gain patterns, directivity
Near_Field_Distributions: E/H fields in volume around antenna or device
RCS_Results: Radar cross-section vs angle/freq, monostatic/bistatic data
